head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KRAMER, ANGELA FRANCES ALLEN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KRAMER, ANGELA FRANCES ALLEN

block.p: KRAMER-Angela Frances Allen. May 2, 2002. After a long illness. Daughter of Terry Allen Kramer and the late Irwin H. Kramer. Sister of Toni Allen Goutal and Nathaniel Charles Allen Kramer. Also survived by seven nieces and nephews. Memorial service Wednesday, May 8, 6 PM, at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81st Street.
